confused.name: Confused
confused.description: Target will act randomly between moving, attacking the nearest target, and doing nothing.

cursed.name: Cursed
cursed.description: Any attack has a chance to fail.

feelThePain.name: Protection: Sanity
feelThePain.description: For the next psychic attack that hits, Investigator will take double Health damage instead of Sanity damage.

invisible.name: Invisible
invisible.description: Target cannot be seen or targeted.

sanityProtection.name: Protection: Sanity
sanityProtection.description: Target has some protection from attacks and effects that reduce sanity.

slowed.name: Slowed
slowed.description: Target can only move one space and take one action per turn.

stealthy.name: Stealthy
stealthy.description: Target is less likely to be hit and may get bonuses to attacking.

unconscious.name: Unconscious
unconscious.description: Target lies prone, unable to move or act. Attacking the unconscious target will awaken it.
